functions.name: flux_dev_nim_ready_check
functions.description: Test the health and readiness endpoints of the Flux dev NIM server

functions.name: check_flux_dev_nim_status
functions.description: Check the status of the flux dev NIM server

functions.name: stop_flux_dev_nim
functions.description: Stop the flux dev NIM server

functions.name: start_flux_dev_nim
functions.description: Start the Flux dev NIM server

functions.name: flux_kontext_nim_ready_check
functions.description: Test health endpoints for Flux Kontext NIM server

functions.name: check_flux_kontext_nim_status
functions.description: Check the status of the Flux Kontext NIM server

functions.name: stop_flux_kontext_nim
functions.description: Stop the Flux Kontext NIM server

functions.name: start_flux_kontext_nim
functions.description: Start the Flux Kontext NIM server

functions.name: comfyui_status
functions.description: Check the status of the ComfyUI service and display system information

functions.name: comfyui_free_memory
functions.description: Call the ComfyUI /free endpoint to free memory and/or unload models

unload_models.description: Whether to unload models from memory (optional, defaults to true)

free_memory.description: Whether to free memory (optional, defaults to true)

functions.name: generate_image
functions.description: Generate an image using the Flux dev NIM API

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the image to generate

steps.description: Number of inference steps for image generation (optional, defaults to 30, range 20-50)

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image (optional, defaults to '16:9'). Valid values: 1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 5:4, 4:5, 3:2, 2:3

cfg.description: CFG scale for image generation (optional, defaults to 5.0, range greater than 1.0 to 9.0)

seed.description: Random seed for image generation (optional, defaults to 0, range 0 to 4294967296)

functions.name: generate_image_using_kontext
functions.description: Use your most recent screenshot from the NVIDIA Gallery to run a Flux Kontext image-to-image workflow

prompt.description: Text prompt for Flux Kontext generation (required)

steps.description: Number of inference steps for image generation (optional, defaults to 30, range 20-50)

cfg.description: CFG scale for image generation (optional, defaults to 5.0, range greater than 1.0 to 9.0)

seed.description: Random seed for image generation (optional, defaults to 0, range 0 to 4294967296)

functions.name: invokeai_status
functions.description: Check the status of the InvokeAI service and display version information

functions.name: invokeai_empty_model_cache
functions.description: Empty the InvokeAI model cache to free up VRAM
